description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，重庆大足人。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, from Dazu, Chongqing.
A county under the jurisdiction of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国高等教育机构，是西南大学的前身之一。
description.en: An institution of higher education in China, one of the predecessors of Southwest University.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国重庆市的一所著名中学。
description.en: A well-known middle school located in Chongqing, China.

description.zh-cn: 负责重庆市教育工作的市政府组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the Chongqing Municipal Government responsible for education.

nodes.id: 中共重庆市九龙坡区委

zh-cn: 中共重庆市九龙坡区委

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市九龙坡区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jiulongpo District, Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 2013年1月爆发的涉及多名重庆市官员的政治丑闻事件。
description.en: A political scandal that broke out in January 2013 involving multiple officials in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
Peng Zhiyong is from Dazu, Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 1988年毕业于西南师范学院数学系。
description.en: Graduated from the Department of Mathematics at Southwest Normal College in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 1988年毕业后任教于重庆巴蜀中学，1994年11月起担任该校常务副校长。
description.en: After graduating in 1988, he taught at Chongqing Bashu Middle School, and became the executive vice principal in November 1994.

description.zh-cn: 自2006年起担任重庆市教育委员会主任，至2010年时仍担任此职。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Chongqing Municipal Education Commission since 2006, and was still holding this position in 2010.

relationships.target: 中共重庆市九龙坡区委

description.zh-cn: 2010年至2013年1月，担任中共重庆市九龙坡区委书记。
description.en: From 2010 to January 2013, he served as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Jiulongpo District Committee.

description.zh-cn: 因重庆官场不雅照事件，彭智勇被免去九龙坡区委书记职务。
description.en: Peng Zhiyong was dismissed from his post as Secretary of the Jiulongpo District Party Committee due to the Chongqing official sex tape scandal.

description.zh-cn: 中共重庆市委于2013年1月免去了彭智勇的九龙坡区委书记职务。
description.en: The CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee dismissed Peng Zhiyong from his post as Secretary of the Jiulongpo District Party Committee in January 2013.

description.zh-cn: 彭智勇是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Peng Zhiyong is a member of the Communist Party of China.
